The code chunk is part of the `getBounds` method within a class that manages on-screen text entry fields, responsible for calculating the visual size of the widget by adjusting coordinates with padding and border width.

# Scale bounds to give a pad around graphics.  We also want to
        # scale around the border width.
        pad = self['pad']
        borderWidth = self['borderWidth']
        self.bounds = [self.ll[0] - pad[0] - borderWidth[0],
                       self.ur[0] + pad[0] + borderWidth[0],
                       self.ll[2] - pad[1] - borderWidth[1],
                       self.ur[2] + pad[1] + borderWidth[1]]
        return self.bounds
